body:
Hi,
I want to export 3d model from autocad 2007 to radiance, is it possible to export this model and if so, what are the rules to follow when drawing the three-
dimensional model of autocad that easily exported to radiance and how to export it?
If this operation is not possible what are the other compatible software with radiance?
Thank you
Im?ne
National School of Architecture of Tunis
___________________________________________________________
Obligatoire au 1er juillet, achetez votre ?thylotest sur Voila.fr http://shopping.voila.fr/thematique/ethylotest
subject: [Radiance-general] exporation 3d model from autocad 2007 to radiance
